transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({_col0_} = toString(byName('_col0_')),
		{_col1_} = toString(byName('_col1_')),
		{_col2_} = toString(byName('_col2_')),
		{_col3_} = toString(byName('_col3_')),
		{_col4_} = toString(byName('_col4_')),
		{_col5_} = toString(byName('_col5_'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 filter(false()
) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['moviesheader.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
